attributes.action: Introduce new regulations to oversee how social services operate
attributes.additional_details: Social services have been found on to many occasions of lying to the courts to get there achieved out come, by introducing new regulations and making social workers accountable for there actions it prevents miss use of powers and corruption. This is why if they are made to wear body cams it would minimise corruption within social services.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to introduce new regulations and laws to prevent discrimination, and to stop social services from violating human rights and falsifying information Social services should be made to wear body cams to prevent social workers from handing false information to the courts.

rejection.details:
Social services are already regulated, and it is not clear how you want these regulations to be changed.

We could accept a petition calling for people working in social services to be required to wear body cameras, if that's what you want to happen.
